Articles.Content:
UPDATED FOR 0.20

I have modified and updated to the modern file formats Novasilisko's N1 rocket from one of his older packs, it now works correctly with fuel and staging icons etc, scaled up closer to the real thing.

Image: http://i.imgur.com/nD75Pe2.jpg

Download: http://www./?8z82i0rvx4k8b21

Knwon Issues:

Fuel runs out before oxidizer on first stage I think.

the main engine continues displaying thrust effect after it has ran out of fuel

Decouplers get very wobbly, I recommend STRUTS!

You need to enable part clipping in alt+f12 debug menu to place the engines inside decouplers

I don't recommend using the included .craft file as last thread people told me it needed more mods than I thought, I think it needs Novapunch, KW rocketry, bobcats soviet pack and tiberdyne.

The only parts included are the 3 fuel tanks, 2 decouplers and the main 30x engine.

I have uploaded this under the terms of Novasilisko "do whatever you want with it licence" , The thread where he said this has been deleted I think but I think mod Sal_vager can verify as he was the one who raised the issue last time I posted this.

The rocket is around 2.18m at it's smallest point, the 3 man capsule fits on there great.

Edited May 24, 2013 by skeligandrew
Interesting, ill give it a try. After all, I've never really seen a N-1 on the forums until now, and it looks really good. Also, the mod's name is Sal_vager.

Is there any chance youd change the 30x engine into 30 engines to place?or just give us a single engine version, for those peeps who have computers which dont have trouble running 30 engines at a time...

(oh yeah,and a 30x1 adapter plate would be awesome ofcourse)
I don't think performance issues have anything to do with the engine block as it is just one low poly-ish model
thats not the point,having 30 seperate parts, and engines,each with their effects puts some drain onto CPUs, but I think its still doable, and Id love to have a NK-33 clone sitting in my VAB
I like the N-1 I think i'll give it a try
Is this compatible with BobCat's LK moon lander / Progress craft?
Yeah but there are not proper fairings

can you get permisson to re distribute the parts? it'd make it easier then hunting through dozens of parts mods

and can you reupload as .zip?

Edited July 20, 2013 by DarthVader
